name: Data Pipeline & ETL PRD
description: ETL pipeline for data ingestion, transformation, and warehouse loading

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) pipeline for ingesting and processing data from multiple sources.

sections.title: Functional Requirements
sections.content: Data connectors, transformations, incremental loading, data quality checks, monitoring

sections.title: Non-Functional Requirements
sections.content: 99.9% uptime, < 1 hour latency, scales to 10x data volume
